", "eligibilityDescription": [{"type": "ul_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "The applicant should either belong to the fishermen community or be one of those professionally engaged in fishing/fish trade occupation on a full-time basis/prospective entrepreneurs. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "The applicant must have resided in the Union territory of Puducherry for a continuous period of not less than five years at the time of applying for extending subsidies/ grants. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "The applicant must have been enrolled as a member of the Fishermen Co-operative Society and be above the age of 23 years and below 60 years.
